column100:
Are you thinking about your next exciting job? Are you looking for the opportunity to take part in an amazing journey towards creating software for the next generation of audio products? If you are passionate about being part of a highly motivated team that all shares the passion and the strong will to deliver premium audio solutions, then come join EPOS!  
   
 Join a growing team  
 You will be part of a new and growing team of skilled Software Engineers. Your tasks in the upcoming years will be or become one of the main Embedded Linux Platform Specialists.  
   
 Most of your work will primarily be evolving and supporting EPOS' new Embedded Linux platform, interfacing towards their DSP and Hardware team.  
   
 Key personal skills are:  
 
 Strong team player as well capable of working independently.  
 Self-motivated, curious, and constantly evolving.  
 Capable of living by EPOS' company values: “We create trust”, “We are team players”, “We create innovative solutions” and “We apply a can-do-attitude”.  
 A fun college who also enjoys having a chat at the coffee machine and joining one of EPOS' Friday-bar.  
 
   
 Your key responsibilities will be:  
 
 Platform integration (eLinux on proprietary hardware)  
 Driver development  
 Documentation  
 CI/CD  
 Develop new concepts and functions to improve and extend our feature set  
 Review open-source licenses to ensure none of them interferes with our product  
 Analyze platform security, pentest, etc.  
 
   
 Some of the exciting technologies we use in this project:  
 We do not expect that you are a master on every of the following tech stacks, but to have a decent level of knowledge and experience in some of them and the attitude and will-power to learn the rest as part of your life long, self-development journey.  
   
 
 Yocto, Buildroot  
 Toolchain generation  
 Device tree  
 POSIX API  
 Vendor specific frameworks  
 C, C++, Rust  
 Schematics  
 Jira, Bitbucket, Confluence  
 Conversational APIs  
 Networking, wired and wireless  
 Integration with MS Teams, Zoom, WebEx  
 
   
 Joining EPOS  
 You will be working in a growing international company with rich opportunities for professional and personal development. At EPOS, they all strive for an open and supportive way of working where sharing knowledge and ideas are highly valued. Furthermore, they all share the passion and the will to deliver premium quality in everything they do.  
   
 You can expect a very dynamic working environment where you will work with state-of the-art technologies, be part of an informal work culture, and have significant influence on your daily work and a manager who ensures that you get the space you need to excel in your role.  
 Interested? 
 The recruitment process is handled by mpeople on behalf of EPOS. If you have any questions about the position or EPOS, please get in touch with Birgitte Vilsgaard on bgv@mpeople.dk or  +45 28 18 18 91  
 We look forward to hearing from you. 
 #jobsforukraine
